```{r}
library(reactable)

reactable(
  iris,
  rownames = FALSE,
  pivotBy = "Species",
  columns = list(
    Sepal.Width = list(aggregate = "mean"),
    Petal.Length = list(aggregate = "sum"),
    Petal.Width = list(aggregate = "count")
  )
)
```
